finance.title: Finance
finance.description: Information about financing arrangements for this contract.

finance.title: Finance
finance.description: Information about financing arrangements for this contracting process.

Finance.title: Financing arrangement
Finance.description: An arrangement between two parties related to raising money.

id.title: ID
id.description: An identifier for this financing arrangement.

title.title: Title
title.description: A short title for this financing arrangement.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of this financing arrangement. This may include details of service fees, commitment fees, lender rights, step in arrangements, exchange rate guarantees, and for syndicated loans, details of syndication and any members of the syndicate.

financingParty.title: Financing organization
financingParty.description: The organization providing this financing arrangement.

source.title: Funding source
source.description: The source of funds for this financing arrangement. For example, the Green Climate Fund.

assetClass.title: Asset class
assetClass.description: The asset class to which this financing arrangement belongs, from the closed assetClass codelist.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of this financing arrangement, from the closed financingArrangementType codelist.

repaymentPriority.title: Repayment priority
repaymentPriority.description: The priority in which the debt in this financing arrangement will be repaid in the event of bankruptcy, from the closed debtRepaymentPriority codelist.

financingPartyType.title: Financing organization type
financingPartyType.description: The type of the financing organization, from the closed financingPartyType codelist.

resultsBased.title: Results based
resultsBased.description: Whether payments under this financing arrangement are contingent on the achievement of pre-defined results.

value.title: Value
value.description: The total value of this finance.

period.title: Finance period
period.description: The period covered by this financing arrangement. Also called maturity.

paymentPeriod.title: Payment period
paymentPeriod.description: The period over which the borrower for this financing arrangement is obliged to make payments.

interestRate.title: Interest rate
interestRate.description: The interest rate associated with this finance.

base.title: Base
base.description: The variable to which an additional margin amount is added to get the Interest amount. This can be specified as a fixed number, as a known variable (e.g. LIBOR or LIBOR+1%), or can be omitted if margin specifies the entire interest rate.

margin.title: Margin
margin.description: The variable added to the base to give the Interest amount expressed as a decimal fraction (e.g. 12.5% = 0.125).

fixed.title: Fixed rate
fixed.description: A boolean field. If this interest rate of fixed, set to true. Otherwise, set to false.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Any explanatory notes concerning the interest rate.

concessional.title: Concessional
concessional.description: Whether this financing arrangement is provided below market rate in order to accelerate climate or development objectives. This is also called soft financing and subsidized funding.

repaymentFrequency.title: Repayment frequency (days)
repaymentFrequency.description: What is the average repayment frequency (in days) for this source of finance. For example, for yearly, use 365; for monthly repayment use 30.4; for daily use 1. User interfaces may wish to translate this into a more user-friendly presentation, such as 'daily','monthly' or 'yearly'.

stepInRights.title: Step in rights
stepInRights.description: Whether provision of this finance confers any step in rights to the financing organization.

exchangeRateGuarantee.title: Exchange rate guarantees
exchangeRateGuarantee.description: Whether there is an associated exchange rate guarantee with this source of finance.

relatedLots.title: Related lot(s)
relatedLots.description: The identifiers of the lots to which this financing arrangement relates.
